name: LUXURY HO CHI MINH CITY BY NIGHT & DINNER ON CRUISE GROUP TOUR
description:
Considered to be "the Pearl of the
Far East," venture through the lit up beauty of Ho Chi Minh as you explore
what its nightlife has to offer. Take a Cyclo tour through downtown, enjoy a
water puppet show, and savor a delicious dinner aboard a ship, accompanied by
outstanding views.
